definition: can sing and dance (idiom); fig. a person of many talents
can/to be able to/might possibly/ability/(physics) energy
good (virtuous)/benevolent/well-disposed/good at sth/to improve or perfect

sentences.english: This is a nation filled with special traditional culture and a nation keen on dancing and singing.
sentences.chinese: 它有古老独特的文化传统，是一个能歌善舞的民族。

sentences.english: My wife is able to sing and dance.
The girls there can sing and dance.
sentences.chinese: 那里的女孩子都能歌善舞。

sentences.english: The qualifications did not include the ability to sing and dance.
sentences.chinese: 在录用资格条件中并不包括要能歌善舞。

sentences.english: In fact, I'm also skilled at singing and dancing.
sentences.chinese: 其实，我也挺能歌善舞的。

sentences.english: She sings, she dances, she acts and she models.
sentences.chinese: 她能歌善舞，既是演员也是模特。

sentences.english: Most of the local residents are experts at dancing and very welcoming.
sentences.chinese: 当地的居民十分好客，而且各个能歌善舞。

sentences.english: These friends are all skilled at singing and dancing.
sentences.chinese: 这些朋友个个都能歌善舞。

sentences.english: Shall we learn the song "we sing and dance"now?
sentences.chinese: 让我们现在学习《我们能歌善舞》这首歌，好吗？

sentences.english: If you visit the River Nu, you will meet some Nu people who are good at both singing and dancing.
sentences.chinese: 如果你去怒江旅游，就能看到能歌善舞的怒族人。

definition: the four arts (zither, Go, calligraphy, painting)/the accomplishments of a well-educated person
can talk really well (idiom); the gift of the gab
